entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early in the evening then changing to periods of snow late in the evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
